data.meta_description: HOME SERVICES EMPLOYERS CANDIDATES YOUR GLOBAL IT-SOLUTIONS PARTNER ABOUT US Outsourcing has become an integral part of the global business. According to Forbes, more than 300,000 jobs were being outsourced annually in the United States alone. While this practice has proven to have significant benefits, outsourcing is also associated with numerous challenges while trying to
data.meta_site_name: NOVAR GROUP - Recruitment (outsourcing) of IT-technology specialists
data.text:
If you are searching for a dependable partner that will commit to developing a tailored outsourcing strategy or to help expanding your IT capabilities and genuinely care about your business and your success, then you have come to the right place!

At NOVAR GROUP we welcome certified professionals from all areas of the IT industry to become part of our amazing global team. Our service portfolio offers a fantastic opportunity to get involved in fascinating IT projects and initiatives with international and well recognized companies in several industries. If you are ready to challenge yourself to the next level of your professional career then you should seize the opportunity to unleash your true potential with NOVAR GROUP. Become a part of an amazing global team and make a real contribution to the world of information technology!

NOVAR GROUP values excellence, competence, and impeccable work ethics above all.

If you feel that you have what it takes to become one of our team members, send us your resume.
